plot: As host nation, Britain has added spectator sport black pudding throwing to the London 2012 Olympic games. We follow gold medal hopeful Chris Lancaster as he makes his comeback to the sport...
title: Black Pudding: An Olympic Bloodsport
plot_es: As host nation, Britain has added spectator sport black pudding throwing to the London 2012 Olympic games. We follow gold medal hopeful Chris Lancaster as he makes his comeback to the sport...
plot_en: As host nation, Britain has added spectator sport black pudding throwing to the London 2012 Olympic games. We follow gold medal hopeful Chris Lancaster as he makes his comeback to the sport...
